verses.name: Mark 11:1
verses.text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem, unto Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount of Olives, he sendeth forth two of his disciples,

verses.name: Mark 11:2
verses.text: And saith unto them, Go your way into the village over against you: and as soon as ye be entered into it, ye shall find a colt tied, whereon never man sat; loose him, and bring him.

verses.name: Mark 11:3
verses.text: And if any man say unto you, Why do ye this? say ye that the Lord hath need of him; and straightway he will send him hither.
